Uses of Class
GraphicsLab.Vector

  • Packages that use Vector 
    Package Description
    GraphicsLab  

    • Uses of Vector in GraphicsLab

      Methods in GraphicsLab that return Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector Vertex.toVector() 
      Constructors in GraphicsLab with parameters of type Vector 
      Constructor and Description
      Normal(Vector vec1, Vector vec2, Vector vec3)
      Constructs a normal vector by taking 3 co-planar points (not co-linear): Based on computing two vectors in the plane, then taking the vector cross product between these to compute the normal; to get the sign right the vectors must be passed in anti-clockwise order.
      Normal(Vector vec1, Vector vec2, Vector vec3, Vector vec4)
      Constructs a normal vector by taking 4 co-planar points (not co-linear): Based on computing two vectors in the plane, then taking the vector cross product between these to compute the normal; to get the sign right the vectors must be passed in anti-clockwise order.
